Summary: 7 black triangles forming patterns while stationary, approached, dropped down, rose up, hovered making patterns, aligned and changed direction leaving slowly and silently,
divs: Sighting DetailsFriend notice approach, dip down and rise, hovering. His wife and I joined saw hovering triangles making patterns of circle, U, V, and aligned in two rows, the circle shape chaned from tight to loose formation. The they aligned in two rows and floated west. Wind blowing from nw. There was no wing flapping, no sound, no physical effects. No reflection of any light. Would have appeared as birds to the casual glances.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Suffolk
There were no other sightings in Suffolk on or around February 10th 2013
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
